

opendota：https://www.opendota.com/

stratz：https://stratz.com/welcome

职业选手比赛追踪：http://www.dota2protracker.com/



如何找到某个系列赛的所有比赛ID



opendota的建表语句

https://github.com/odota/core/blob/master/sql/create_tables.sql

opendota基于postgre数据库



openai的文档：

https://docs.opendota.com/#

api

```python
OPENDOTA_API_BASE_URL = 'https://api.opendota.com/api'
```



获取单局比赛信息

https://api.opendota.com/api/matches/271145478



TI11联赛ID：https://stratz.com/leagues/14268

TI11所有参加小组赛的参赛队伍ID

```python
team_ids = (
    7119388, 2586976, 6209166, 8254400, 7391077,
 	7732977, 8260983, 8291895, 8599101, 350190,
 	39, 7390454, 8131728, 8605863, 8721219,
 	6209804, 8597976, 2163, 1838315, 15
)
```



2022年TI11的所有小组赛比赛ID



```python
# 查询小组赛所有比赛ID的sql
sql="""
SELECT
matches.match_id
FROM matches
WHERE TRUE
AND leagueid=14268
AND matches.start_time >= extract(epoch from timestamp '2022-10-13T16:00:00.000Z')
AND matches.start_time <= extract(epoch from timestamp '2022-10-18T16:00:00.000Z')
group by match_id
"""

url = OPENDOTA_API_BASE_URL + 'explorer'
resp = requests.get(url, params={"sql": sql})
group_match_ids = [i['match_id'] for i in resp.json()['rows']]
```

### 获取单场比赛数据

```python
def get_match(match_id):
    url = f'{OPENDOTA_API_BASE_URL}/matches/{match_id}'
    resp = requests.get(url)
    return resp

def get_player(account_id):
    url = f'{OPENDOTA_API_BASE_URL}/players/{account_id}'
    resp = requests.get(url)
    return resp

# 保存json
def save_json(file_path, data):
    with open(file_path, mode='w') as f:
        json.dump(data, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False)
```
